```{r}
library(readxl)
data=read_excel("computer related offense.xlsx")
data
x=data$year
y=data$CasesReported
plot(data,pch=20,col="blue4")
lines(data)

model1=lm(y~x)
summary(model1)

model2=lm(y~poly(x,2,raw = TRUE))
summary(model2)

model3 = lm(log(y) ~ x)
summary(model3)

x_axis=2014:2020
data.frame(year=data$year,actual = data$CasesReported,linear=predict(model1,data.frame(x=x_axis)),quad = predict(model2,data.frame(x=x_axis)),loge = predict(model3,data.frame(x=x_axis)))

plot(data,pch=20,col="blue4")
m3=function(x){
  exp(-524.60367+0.26470*x)
}
curve(m3,from = 2014 ,to = 2020,add = TRUE ,lwd = 1.5 , col = "blue")
```
